lead_paragraph: THE PACIFIC RAILROAD--GOOD NEWS!--THOMAS ALLEN, Esq., President of the Pacific Railroad Company, arrived in this city, yesterday, in seven and a half days from New-York. We are gratified in being able to inform the public, that Mr. Allen has made all the contracts in the East which he was authorized to make.
